title: Biometric login with Face ID and fingerprint
description: Support device biometric authentication as a convenient alternative to password entry, backed by secure enclave token storage.

title: Calculated fields and custom metrics
description: Support user-defined calculated fields using a formula editor, enabling custom KPIs derived from existing data columns. Ref: ENG-{num}

title: Fuzzy matching and typo tolerance
description: Handle misspellings and approximate matches using edit-distance algorithms so that minor typos do not prevent users from finding results.

title: Faceted search with dynamic filter counts
description: Display faceted navigation panels showing available filter options with document counts that update dynamically as filters are applied. Addresses FEAT-{num}.

title: Google Sheets live import connector
description: Import data directly from a Google Sheet URL with automatic schema detection and optional recurring sync on a schedule. Ref: ENG-{num}

title: Drag-and-drop widget layout editor
description: Allow users to compose dashboards by dragging chart, table, and metric widgets onto a responsive grid with snap-to-grid alignment.

title: Mobile push notifications
description: Deliver real-time push notifications to iOS and Android devices for critical alerts, mentions, and task assignments.

title: Background sync and conflict resolution
description: Sync data changes made offline in the background when connectivity resumes, with automatic conflict detection and resolution strategies.

title: Presentation mode for TV displays and meetings
description: Provide a full-screen presentation mode that cycles through dashboard tabs on a configurable timer, optimized for wall-mounted displays.

title: Jira issue tracking integration
description: Link platform entities to Jira issues, sync status changes bidirectionally, and surface Jira context within the product interface. Tracked in TASK-{num}.

title: GraphQL API endpoint
description: Expose a GraphQL endpoint enabling clients to query exactly the data they need with nested relations, reducing over-fetching and round trips.

title: Webhook subscription management API
description: Allow consumers to programmatically register, list, update, and delete webhook subscriptions for any event type via a dedicated API resource. Addresses FEAT-2956.

title: SCIM 2.0 automated user provisioning
description: Enable automated user lifecycle management through SCIM 2.0, syncing user creation, updates, and deactivation from identity providers. See JIRA-{num} for implementation details.

title: CSV import wizard with preview and validation
description: Guide users through CSV upload with a step-by-step wizard showing data preview, column type detection, validation errors, and import confirmation.

title: Tablet-optimized split-view layout
description: On tablets, provide a split-view layout with a navigation list on the left and detail pane on the right, taking advantage of larger screens. Related: PROJ-{num}

title: Consolidated billing for multi-org accounts
description: Allow parent organizations to receive a single consolidated invoice covering all subsidiary accounts with itemized breakdowns.

title: Daily and weekly digest emails
description: Send consolidated digest emails summarizing key metrics, recent alerts, and activity highlights on a daily or weekly schedule. Related: PROJ-{num}

title: Pivot table support in reports
description: Add pivot table capabilities allowing users to dynamically rearrange rows, columns, and aggregate measures within a report view.

title: Unified notification center with inbox
description: Provide an in-app notification center aggregating all alerts, mentions, and system messages with read/unread state and bulk actions.

title: Search REST API for external consumers
description: Expose a search API endpoint allowing external applications and integrations to execute search queries programmatically.

title: Zapier connector with 50+ triggers and actions
description: Provide a Zapier integration enabling no-code workflows with thousands of external applications via triggers and action events.

title: SSO and SAML 2.0 federation
description: Support enterprise single sign-on via SAML 2.0 identity providers including Okta, Azure AD, and OneLogin with JIT user provisioning.

title: Search result permissions and access filtering
description: Ensure search results respect the current user's access permissions, filtering out records and dashboards the user is not authorized to view.

title: Configurable password policies
description: Allow admins to enforce password complexity requirements, rotation intervals, breach detection, and account lockout thresholds.

title: PDF and CSV export for all report types
description: Enable one-click export of any report to PDF or CSV format, preserving layout, filters, and formatting. See JIRA-{num} for implementation details.

title: Mobile dashboard with responsive widgets
description: Display dashboards with widgets automatically reflowed for mobile viewports, supporting touch-based filtering and drill-down interactions.

title: Expanded chart library with 20+ visualization types
description: Introduce new chart types including waterfall, funnel, treemap, heatmap, and Sankey diagrams to support diverse analytical needs. Related: PROJ-9556

title: Import rollback and undo capability
description: Allow users to fully undo a completed import within 48 hours, reverting all created and modified records to their pre-import state.

title: Embeddable dashboard widgets via iframe
description: Generate secure, token-authenticated embed codes for individual widgets or full dashboards to embed in external portals and applications.

title: Webhook forwarding for external systems
description: Forward notification payloads to external webhook endpoints, enabling integration with custom alerting pipelines and third-party tools.

title: File and attachment content search
description: Index the contents of uploaded files including PDFs, Word documents, and spreadsheets to include them in full-text search results. See JIRA-2572 for details.

title: Data drill-down from summary to row-level detail
description: Allow users to click on any aggregated metric in a report to drill down into the underlying row-level data powering that number.

title: SMS alert delivery for critical events
description: Send SMS text messages for the most critical alerts to ensure delivery even when users are away from their devices or email. Ref: ENG-6697

title: Slack channel routing for alert categories
description: Route different alert categories to specific Slack channels, with formatting options and the ability to thread related alerts. Tracked in TASK-{num}.

title: Rate limit dashboard and self-serve adjustments
description: Provide a dashboard showing current API usage against rate limits, with the ability for customers to request or purchase higher limits.

title: Notification history and delivery log
description: Maintain a searchable log of all sent notifications with delivery status, timestamps, and the ability to resend failed deliveries. Addresses FEAT-3253.

title: Mobile-responsive dashboard view
description: Automatically reflow dashboard layouts for mobile screen sizes with collapsible widget sections and touch-optimized interactions. Related: PROJ-7560

title: Multi-currency billing
description: Support billing in multiple currencies with automatic exchange rate conversion, localized invoice formatting, and currency-specific payment methods.

title: Notification templates with variable substitution
description: Provide customizable notification templates with merge fields for dynamic content such as metric values, user names, and timestamps.

title: Annual and multi-year plan support
description: Support annual and multi-year subscription plans with upfront or installment payment options, including prorated upgrades mid-term. Tracked in TASK-243.

title: Advanced search operators and query syntax
description: Support boolean operators (AND, OR, NOT), field-specific search (status:active), date ranges, and quoted phrase matching. See JIRA-{num} for implementation details.

title: Real-time data refresh with configurable intervals
description: Support automatic dashboard refresh with user-configurable intervals from 10 seconds to 24 hours, with visual indicators of data freshness.

title: KPI summary cards with trend indicators
description: Add configurable KPI cards that display a primary metric, comparison period change, trend sparkline, and conditional color coding.

title: Scoped API key permissions
description: Enable fine-grained API key scoping so that each key can be restricted to specific resources, operations, and IP ranges.

title: Typeahead suggestions with recent history
description: Show real-time search suggestions as users type, combining popular queries, recent search history, and matching entity names.

title: Global dashboard filters and cross-widget filtering
description: Apply date range, segment, and dimension filters at the dashboard level that propagate to all widgets, with cross-filtering on widget click. See JIRA-{num} for implementation details.

title: Batch operations API for bulk CRUD
description: Support batch endpoints that accept arrays of operations in a single request, reducing latency and simplifying bulk data manipulation workflows. See JIRA-{num} for implementation details.

title: Report sharing with granular permissions
description: Allow users to share reports with specific teams or individuals, controlling whether recipients can view, edit, or duplicate the report.

title: Dark mode and custom theme support
description: Offer a dark color theme and allow organizations to apply custom brand colors, fonts, and logos across all dashboard elements. Addresses FEAT-2753.

title: Pre-import validation preview with error highlighting
description: Before committing an import, show a comprehensive validation report highlighting type mismatches, missing required fields, and constraint violations. Addresses FEAT-1107.

title: Do-not-disturb and quiet hours
description: Allow users to set quiet hours and do-not-disturb windows during which non-critical notifications are silently queued for later delivery.

title: Enterprise SSO with SAML and OIDC
description: Support single sign-on via SAML 2.0 and OpenID Connect identity providers, with automatic account linking and JIT provisioning. Tracked in TASK-8800.

title: API versioning with deprecation policy
description: Implement a formal API versioning scheme with date-based versions, sunset headers, and a published deprecation timeline.

title: SFTP scheduled imports
description: Connect to customer SFTP servers on a configurable schedule to automatically fetch and import new data files with processing confirmation notifications.

title: Team-based access control and workspaces
description: Organize users into teams that map to organizational units, each with independent workspace access, data visibility, and permission inheritance. Addresses FEAT-6050.

title: Incremental and delta import mode
description: Support incremental imports that only process new or changed records since the last import run, based on a user-specified timestamp or ID column.

title: Mobile data entry forms
description: Support creating and editing records via mobile-optimized forms with smart input types, camera capture, and location auto-fill.

title: Billing API for programmatic invoice access
description: Expose a REST API allowing customers to programmatically retrieve invoices, payment history, and current subscription details.

title: Guest and external collaborator accounts
description: Invite external users with limited, time-bound access to specific projects or dashboards without requiring a full seat license.

title: Interactive API documentation portal
description: Host an interactive API reference powered by OpenAPI specs with try-it-out functionality, code examples in multiple languages, and changelog. See JIRA-2041 for details.

title: Full-text search across all entity types
description: Index and search across records, reports, dashboards, users, and documentation with relevance-ranked results and highlighted matches.

title: Salesforce bi-directional sync
description: Sync accounts, contacts, and opportunity data between the platform and Salesforce with configurable field mappings and conflict resolution.

title: Offline mode with local data cache
description: Cache critical data locally so users can view dashboards, records, and reports without connectivity, with automatic sync when back online. See JIRA-{num} for implementation details.

title: Multi-factor authentication enforcement
description: Support TOTP, SMS, and hardware key second factors with organization-level policies to mandate MFA for all users or specific roles.

title: Shared dashboards with view and edit permissions
description: Enable dashboard sharing across teams with role-based access controlling who can view, interact with filters, or edit the layout. See JIRA-5715 for details.

title: Custom role and permission builder
description: Allow admins to define custom roles with fine-grained permission sets controlling access to features, data scopes, and administrative actions. Ref: ENG-1765

title: Duplicate detection and merge rules
description: Detect potential duplicate records during import using configurable matching rules and allow users to choose merge, skip, or create-new strategies. See JIRA-4814 for details.

title: Custom alert rules with threshold conditions
description: Allow users to define alert rules based on metric thresholds, trend deviations, or data anomalies with configurable evaluation frequency.

title: Scheduled report delivery via email
description: Users can schedule reports to be automatically generated and emailed to specified recipients on a daily, weekly, or monthly basis.

title: Cursor-based pagination for all list endpoints
description: Migrate all list endpoints from offset-based to cursor-based pagination to improve performance and consistency for large result sets.

title: Cross-workspace report aggregation
description: Enable reports that pull data from multiple workspaces into a single unified view, useful for enterprise customers managing several business units. See JIRA-5568 for details.

title: Slack workspace notifications
description: Push alerts, report summaries, and activity notifications to designated Slack channels with customizable formatting. See JIRA-{num} for implementation details.

title: Searchable user directory with org chart
description: Provide a directory view of all users with search, filters by role and team, and an optional org-chart visualization for management hierarchy.

title: Push notification deep-linking
description: Tapping a push notification opens the relevant record, dashboard, or report directly within the mobile app with full context preserved. Addresses FEAT-1149.

title: Microsoft Teams integration
description: Deliver notifications, report snapshots, and interactive action cards directly to Microsoft Teams channels and group chats. See JIRA-4458 for details.

title: Payment method management portal
description: Allow users to add, remove, and set default payment methods including credit cards, ACH bank transfers, and wire transfer instructions.

title: Mobile-optimized report viewer
description: Render reports in a touch-friendly, scrollable format optimized for small screens with swipe navigation between report pages.

title: Search analytics and query performance dashboard
description: Track search query volumes, zero-result rates, click-through patterns, and average response times to identify content gaps. Tracked in TASK-9693.

title: Usage-based billing metering
description: Track and bill customers based on actual usage metrics such as API calls, data volume, or active users with configurable billing thresholds. Addresses FEAT-4516.

title: Google Sheets live push
description: Automatically push query results or report data to a designated Google Sheet on a schedule or upon data change events.
